You dive, roll and swerve past all danger while remaining a deadly and quick combatant.

You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}. Once during your movement, you can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.sLikawnrJJzHMYeC]{Aim} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} at a creature you are attempting to move through, even if you fail. If you spend 2 actions, you can Aim and then Strike. On a success, you do not treat an enemyâ€™s space as difficult terrain, and you do not trigger reactions from your movement.

Special If you have @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feats.c0TkeJ8LytJ5A6A1]{Tactical Advance} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.feats.rWDM8q30Fay713In]{Mobile Aim}, you can use them as part of Bullet Time. Instead of Striding, you Tumble Through instead. If you use Tactical Advance, you do not trigger reactions even on a failure. If you use Mobile Aim, you can Aim an additional time at any point during Bullet Time.
